<end>

151509.スライムレースの 遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\nスライムレースでは レースが:
This is an explanation of how to play Slime Race!
In a Slime Race, you can set up a strategy before the race starts to determine which skills to use and where to use them.
The Slime in the lead uses a skill each time it passes one of the checkpoints.
The Slimes that are not in the lead will use their skills at the same time the Slime in the lead does.
Also, in training races, you can check your competitors' strategies when setting up your own strategy, so make use of this feature.
Think carefully about the best positions to use your Slime's skills during the race to emerge victorious!

157720.とくぎ「<%sCAS_tokugi>」は\n覚えているだけで 常に効果があります:
The "<%sCAS_tokugi>" skill
is passive and its effects are always active.
